channel.title: Signature
channel.description:

item.title: Signature
item.dc:creator: @tigerclan tigerclan
item.description:
@tigerclan wrote:

think you should move the text over a little bit so it doesnt feel like its against the side of the image. idk, thats just my opinion. looks good though

Read full topic

item.title: Signature
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“b00mz1029, post:12, topic:524842”][quote author=Mikeyzzz link=topic=643532.msg4331952#msg4331952 date=1373767324]

Its pretty cool actually, not everyone will understand the simplicity of the design of this image but there lose.

Although for the text I would of had it faded more into the background, so it matches the rest of the image right now its more “in your face” then it really should be for the style you’re going for.

*Loss

OT: Very nice, maybe a little texture in the background and on the guy would look nice. Nothing, big, just a small dark texture.
[/quote]Added a texture on BG and render. V2?

Now it looks great :P[/quote]
Better then before I see

Read full topic
